verses.verse: <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H61>Nevertheless<s%> there are <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H1197>you,<s%> in that you have put away the <S%H842>Asheroth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and have <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

<S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and brought them <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
He <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> throughout all the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> by <S%H5892>city,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H7200>"Consider<s%> what you <S%H6213>do:<s%> for you <S%H8199>don't<s%> judge for <S%H120>man,<s%> but for <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he is with you in the <S%H1697>judgment.<s%>

Now therefore let the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be on <S%H8104>you.<s%> Take heed and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>it:<s%> for there is no iniquity with <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> nor <S%H4856>respect<s%> of <S%H6440>persons,<s%> nor <S%H4727>taking<s%> of <S%H7810>bribes.<s%>"

Moreover in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for <S%H7379>controversies.<s%> They <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "Thus you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H530>faithfully,<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

Whenever any controversy shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you from your <S%H251>brothers<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> between <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood,<s%> between <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> you shall <S%H2094>warn<s%> <S%H816>them,<s%> that they not be guilty towards <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and so <S%H7110>wrath<s%> come on you and on your <S%H251>brothers.<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> <S%H3541>this,<s%> and you shall not be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

<S%H568>Behold,<s%> Amariah the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> is over you in all <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>matters:<s%> also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall be <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>you.<s%> Deal <S%H2388>courageously,<s%> and may <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be with the <S%H2896>good.<s%>"
